Origin of your username?
replies.body_tagged:

Origin of your username?

replies.body:
well back in the day when i was using cracked, my original username was T93ClutchGamer (T cuz my nickname is Toby, 93 my fav no. at the time, and i was into racing alot back then so i put in Clutch then Gamer)

then after a couple months, i renamed it to Ripslinger82 (Ripslinger was a character from the movie Planes and no. 82 was the car no. of Chick Hicks in Cars) then that acc got alot of hate on a server that i used to play in so for the 3rd time

I Changed the name to iTerraCubist ( i cuz its like saying im, then the TerraCubist was just me thinking of a Minecraft-like name)
